title: Peacefull Property
details:
This land is situated in Habaraduwa-Liyanagoda in a sunny and peacefull location with residental nighborhood. Only 8 minutes walk to the famous Habarduwa/Koggala beach. Close to supermarkets and banks. It has it's own driveway a water supply well, fence and a gate, many banana and coconuttrees.
Perfect for build a holiday home or small guesthouses.
